downloadTitle: Enterprise Library for .NET Framework 2.0: Performance Comparison 64 Bit vs. 32 Bit
downloadDescription: This document provides an analysis of the Enterprise Library deployment in both a 32-bit (2 and 4 processor) and 64-bit (2 and 4 processor) environment and examines their relative performance to a 32-bit 2 processor server.
detailsSection: This document provides an analysis Enterprise Library deployment in both a 32-bit (2 and 4 processor) and 64-bit (2 and 4 processor) environment and examines their relative performance to a 32-bit 2 processor server. The goal was to obtain the relative performance measurements of the Enterprise Library Logging Application Block, Caching Application Block, Data Access Application Block and the scalability from going from a 2 to a 4 bit processor arrangement in each environment.
installInstructionSection: Click the download link and view the pdf file using Adobe Reader 5.0 or later.
